text: Kare-ra wa doko ni itte mo, kutsujoku o ukerudearou. Arrā kara (hogo) no seiyaku o sazukaru ka, hitobito to (kōshu) no meiyaku o shinai kagiri wa. Kare-ra wa arrā no ikari o hi muri, hinkon ni tsukimatowa reyou. Kore wa kare-ra ga, arrā no shirushi o shinjizu ni, seigi o mushi shite yogen-sha-tachi o satsugai shita tamedearu. Kore wa kare-ra ga hankō shite hō o koete ita tamedearu
